project.title: 2018 Â· A customisation design tool for Correctbook
project.intro: I created a mobile first design of a web-based customisation tool for Correctbook; a social enterprise that produces durable and endlessly erasable notebooks. The profit from purchases goes to illiterate children in need of writing material. In order to raise more money for the children, Correctbook wants to attract companies to sell more notebooks by offering them an option to customise their own sustainable notebook. *This project was part of my UX training at Humanoids.
